channel.title: Bombing mission; the Black mages (ff7) + others
channel.description:
to the many people who have played final fantasy, 7 is eaisyly one of the greatest, and to all people who have played the game, you would know the song at the very start of the game; This music track is called Bombing mission and has been remade by the origonal composer, Nobuo uematsu. I would think many people would like this remake and (like me) would listen to it on there ipod.
Enough talk, more music :D
Origonal piece (from ff7) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fHm-jb4FqyA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fHm-jb4FqyA[/url]
Remade version.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHdoNO1vMgQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHdoNO1vMgQ[/url]
there is also some good music tracks by the same band from other final fantasy games, heres a few links. Enjoy.
Battle scene (ff1) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rK1zsNSQqqU]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rK1zsNSQqqU[/url]
Battle theme (ff6) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=osdHg6K4M_M]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=osdHg6K4M_M[/url]
Clash on the big bridge (ff5) (one of my favorites) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aha5Vcshz2c]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aha5Vcshz2c[/url]
Neo EXDEATH (ff5) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hTXVAkHAZfg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hTXVAkHAZfg[/url]
KURAYAMINOKUMO (ff3) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWv_xxJJ_8I]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWv_xxJJ_8I[/url]
Cheers and enjoy!

item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

to the many people who have played final fantasy, 7 is eaisyly one of the greatest, and to all people who have played the game, you would know the song at the very start of the game; This music track is called Bombing mission and has been remade by the origonal composer, Nobuo uematsu.
I would think many people would like this remake and (like me) would listen to it on there ipod.
